name: Make History Gay Again
description:
Make History Gay Again

Make History Gay Again is a video game that playfully explains some of the most important LGBTQIA+ events . This game's goal is to bring light onto the problems of the inexistent archives of the LGBTQIA+ fights. This version currently availble is a try out version in french of the first known big even

Created by Graf in 2021 during

 Interractive Design and Retro Gaming 

classes (by Floren) at ESAD of Orléans
